definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
clown/2nd earthly branch: 1-3 a.m., 12th solar month (6th January to 3rd February), year of the Ox/ancient Chinese compass point: 30°
variant of 紐扣|纽扣[niu3 kou4]
decorated knob protruding from seal, allowing it to be strung on a cord

sentences.english: The radio's dial twirled and the lights behind the tuning panel went out.
sentences.chinese: 收音機的調諧鈕轉動了一下，面板上的指示燈熄滅了。

sentences.english: An issue with the gang broadcast buttons being misplaced after undocking has been fixed.
sentences.chinese: 出站導致團隊廣播鈕消失的問題修正。

sentences.english: Press the button to ring the bell.
Thus, frequent adjustment of the control knob is required to maintain constant delivery pressure.
sentences.chinese: 因此經常要調整控制鈕，以維持恆定的輸出壓力。

sentences.english: A really well-made buttonhole is the only link between art and nature.
sentences.chinese: 開得好的鈕眼兒是聯繫藝術與自然的惟一環節。

sentences.english: This is the call button. If you need our help.
sentences.chinese: 這是呼叫鈕，如果您需要我們做什麼，只需按一下。

sentences.english: Her dress fastens with hooks and eyes.
sentences.chinese: 她的衣服用鈕鉤和鈕環扣住。

sentences.english: Two adjusting screws harmonise the guns with the sight.
sentences.chinese: 有兩個調節鈕來校準武器和瞄準具。

sentences.english: The external fitting temperature controller consists of a power light and a temperature adjusting knob.
sentences.chinese: 外接式控溫器應包括有電源指示燈及溫控調整鈕。

sentences.english: There's a button here on your armrest. Just push it and lean back at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 您座椅扶手上有一個鈕，按下去，同時向後靠就行了。

sentences.english: This one is the call button, if you need us, please push it.
sentences.chinese: 這是呼叫鈕，如果需要我們幫忙，請按一下。

sentences.english: Niu (button) means the knot of a strip which can be unfastened;
sentences.chinese: “鈕”是帶的交結之處同時結之可解者，亦謂之鈕。

sentences.english: Niu (button) means the knot of a strip which can be unfastened;
sentences.chinese: “鈕”是帶的交結之處同時結之可解者，亦謂之鈕。

sentences.english: The materials for making a button can be many, and "corozo" has always been my favourite.
sentences.chinese: 鈕釦的材料種類繁多，果實鈕一直是我最鍾愛的類別。

sentences.english: Hit the wrong button and you die.

definition: circle/round/circular/spherical/(of the moon) full/unit of Chinese currency (yuan)/tactful/to make consistent and whole (the narrative of a dream or a lie)
mellow and full/suave/smooth and round/rich (in voice)
calabash or bottle gourd (Lagenaria siceraria)/hoist/generic term for block and tackle (or parts thereof)/muddled/(poker) full house
decoration/ornament/to decorate/to adorn/to hide/to conceal (a fault)/excuse (to hide a fault)/to play a role (in opera)/to impersonate
hammer/to hammer into shape/weight (e.g. of a steelyard or balance)/to strike with a hammer
